message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a price of $14,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you, even exceeding its worth to you in the long run.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to pay that much for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value to me is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500?
I'm not sure I can go as high as $12,500. How about we meet at $11,500? I'm willing to pay that much for the product.
